text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the HP OMEN 17t Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel 8th Gen Coffee Lake i7-8750H, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" FHD (1920x1080) G-SYNC, GTX 1070, Thunderbolt 3, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the HP OMEN 17t Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel 8th Gen Coffee Lake i7-8750H, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" FHD (1920x1080) G-SYNC, GTX 1070, Thunderbolt 3, Win 10 Home) VR Ready. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP OMEN 17t Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel 8th Gen Coffee Lake i7-8750H, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" FHD (1920x1080) G-SYNC, GTX 1070, Thunderbolt 3, Win 10 Home) VR Ready!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the HP OMEN 17t Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel 8th Gen Coffee Lake i7-8750H, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" FHD (1920x1080) G-SYNC, GTX 1070, Thunderbolt 3, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the HP OMEN 17t Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel 8th Gen Coffee Lake i7-8750H, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" FHD (1920x1080) G-SYNC, GTX 1070, Thunderbolt 3, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
